name: Parsley and Walnut-Crusted Salmon
author: Allrecipes Magazine
summary: This Allrecipes Magazine recipe is based on Cilantro and Walnut Crusted Salmon.
ingredients: 1 ½ pounds salmon fillets, cut into 4-ounce portions
1 cup chopped packed fresh flat-leaf parsley
directions: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Drizzle 1 tablespoon oil in a 9x13-inch baking dish
Process parsley, lemon juice, garlic, salt, pepper, and remaining 2 tablespoons oil in a food processor until evenly chopped
Add 1/3 cup walnut pieces; process until combined and walnuts are still a bit chunky
Bake in the preheated oven until salmon flakes easily with a fork, 20 to 25 minutes
Garnish with chopped walnuts and serve with lemon wedges
